member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList.AssertResourceState
member.summary: Checks whether a resource, or subresource, is in a specified state, or not.
member.param: The index of the subresource to check. This can be set to an index, or D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER_ALL_SUBRESOURCES.
Specifies the state to check for. This can be one or more D3D12_RESOURCE_STATES flags Or'ed together.
member.returns: This method returns true if the resource or subresource is in the specified state, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList.GetFeatureMask
member.summary: Returns the debug feature flags that have been set on a command list.
member.returns: A bit mask containing the set debug features.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandList.SetFeatureMask
member.summary: Turns the debug features for a command list on or off.
member.param: A combination of feature-mask flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. If a flag is present, that feature will be set to on, otherwise the feature will be set to off.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.
